articles.title: Senators bring back F Sabourin one-year deal - TSN
articles.description: Scott Sabourin is back in Ottawa. The Senators signed the forward on Tuesday to a one-year, two-way contract, which will carry an annual value of $700,000 in the National Hockey League and $200,000 in the American Hockey League.
